actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The giant makes two Falchion attacks.

actions.name: Falchion
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +12 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 23 (6d4 + 8) slashing damage.

actions.name: Rock
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack: +12 to hit, range 60/240 ft., one target. Hit: 30 (4d10 + 8) bludgeoning damage.

special_abilities.name: Desert Walk
special_abilities.desc: Difficult terrain composed of sand or gravel doesn't cost the desert giant extra movement.

special_abilities.name: Sand Camouflage
special_abilities.desc: The giant has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks made to hide in sandy terrain.
